phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
I would not know, since I really have not done any dieting.
I guess I just have a good metabolism.
Kawashima has really become the centre of attention among the girls.
If you push yourself too hard, you will just be piling up stress.
Maintaining a good balance between eating what you want and eating healthily is probably the best.
Now that I just cannot ignore!
It is customary to bring only up to 300 yen's worth of meat for trips!
Is this only 300 yen's worth of excess flab?
Bananas like these do not fit in the meat category!
This here is from meat buns!
Here is the expensive ice cream!
And here is the American dark cherry!
I dedicate this to the tears of the dieting warriors that have vanished along with the stardust.
The divine fist of convenience stores!
My, she was quite an admirable foe.
That was really mean of them.
That was the first of many storms to come.
Coming out of nowhere, those two were so mean!
If you go about it like that, Ami ends up like this, huh?
Just what I would expect from you, Minorin.
As a dieting warrior, I was not able to hold myself back.
As long as you face the fat head on,
you will obtain the grace of the god of weight loss.
I am sure she will understand this someday too.
Is that really how it works?
What is that guy doing here?
Ryuuji, want me to make some salad for dinner tonight?
I learned how in primary school.
I can even make the dressing on my own.
First you buy the lettuce, right?
Then you separate the leaves and slice them up, right?
And then you put it on a plate.
You did not wash the lettuce, you did not put it under running water,
and where did the dressing go?
Shut up about the trivial things, you nosy sister-in-law.
Please, can I stay with you for a moment?
That is the guy from earlier.
Hey, how long do you intend to cling to him?
Completely ignoring my existence, sticking closely to him,
It is not someone you know, right?
When you are a model, things like this happen sometimes.
It is like getting entangled with your fans, or well...
And here I even went and changed schools...
Hey, you are going home now, right?
Could you hide me in your house for a little while?
Meeting him again would be scary...
So that is how it is.
If that is the case, then just leave it to me.
Between a draughty, wooden, rented house, and an auto-locked,
high-security, expensive apartment, which would you prefer?
Wait a minute, why does Ami-chan have to go to your place?
It is okay, I will not force you.
But keep in mind that Ryuuji's place is so vulnerable that even I could easily sneak in.
Fine then, it is none of my business anyway.
I am telling you to wait already!
This is the honey-preserved kumquat that Ryuuji has been making a lot of.
I tried mixing it with soda.
Who is the dieting warrior, huh?
It is like your brain is the same size you are.
Man, you sure do change when you are like that.
It makes me want to show the people in our class how you really are.
Like I would ever show my true self to anyone.
Now, when you drink honey-preserved kumquat, your throat becomes nice and clear.
You do not intend to show your true self?
let us have you show off your fake self instead.
Yeah, I could not shake off my exhaustion from yesterday...
Right, you went through a scary situation there.
For roughly five hours in Aisaka Taiga's apartment... no, six hours...
Did Taiga do something to you?
Oda Nobunaga singing French songs with enthusiasm...
Susano-o, Amaterasu, Uzume, Quetzalcoatl, Matthew, Judas!
Oh yes, I made her do a medley of 150 different imitations!
I cannot even begin to guess how to imitate Akechi Mitsuhide.
I told her I would throw her out if she did not do what I told her to.
Then she frantically did my every bidding.
Aisaka, I have a favour to ask of you!
Ami-chan, you do not look so good.
Are you sure you should not go to the infirmary?
Putting on a sweet and innocent act, yelping all the time, and you are always in heat...
Why should I come with you, huh?!
I got plans with my frie -
Mona Lisa attacking a corner at 200 kilometres an hour.
I have already made copies of the pictures I took.
There is a chance they might accidentally get spread around.
I just have to come along, right?!
I forgot I was going to eat lunch with Aisaka-san today.
What is this supposed to be?
If she keeps interacting with people just using her faCade,
Ami will not make any real friends.
So I am asking you two, who know her true colours already, to take care of her.
but no matter how you look at it, the chemistry between Taiga and Kawashima's not really...
You are one of the very few female friends that I can ask favours of!
Pushing the trouble onto us and running off to the student council on his own...
It might look large, but this lunch box is super low on calories.
Look, these are king trumpet mushrooms, this here is konjac, and this is thread-konjac rice!
Sheesh, why do I have to do this?
I will share some konbu with you.
I do not want the damn thing.
Right, lunch, got to eat my lunch box.
Why does Takasu-kun's lunch box have the same side-dishes as Aisaka-san's?
Now there is no problem, right?
My lunch box is a omelette and fried food lunch box, while Ryuuji's is a just a seaweed and rice lunch box.
Here, now Takasu-kun has a meatball-lunch box.
But why do you let Aisaka-san do whatever she wants all the time?
You see, Ryuuji was my dog in his previous life.
A dog's happiness is measured by how useful he is to his master.
These two are meant for one another, you see!
Geez, why do you do this, Minorin?
Everyone, please listen to me for a moment!
Today, we are having the customary neighbourhood volunteer cleaning rally that the student council organises every month,
but this time we are a bit short on hands.
Could any brave heroes that would like to participate, please come forward?
Today, Super Kanoya has a special sale -
Go change and meet up in the school yard.
Sheesh, why do I have to?
Look, I am taking responsibility and coming along to participate with you.
That is what you are saying, but you just wanted to spend some more time with Kitamura, right?
I just transferred, so I want to get more familiar with the school.
As a dieting warrior, I just cannot help but want to cheer on girls who are desperately working up a sweat, trying to lose weight.
I never said that I wanted to lose weight or anything like that.
Let us do our best together, Takasu-kun!
Put some heart into it, and let us move out!
Do not even dare to skip out on this, you bunch of scum!
Do not take the town lightly.
With that level of guts you will get tossed off this trip, you maggots!
Put some spunk into that reply, you cowards!
That is our president for sure.
All right, I will explain the program.
After all that, Kitamura ended up going with the student council.
Sorry, the council staff is going a different way!
Hey, does not this piece of trash look just like Aisaka-san?
Well, this piece of trash here looks just like Kawashima-san.
It is just as sodden, sloppy, and flabby as you.
Let us go the other way, Minorin.
Let us get away from here.
Those two just bailed, did not they?
The ones left behind should get along well, right?
Picking up trash can be pretty fun too.
Or maybe it is because I am together with Takasu-kun?
Hey, let us go that way next.
Oh man, that is so filthy!
Right, it is all okay now.
Look, the frog has gone back home.
I do not want to do this any more!
We have got to find shelter from the rain.
It is enough already, stop doing that.
I am the one who does not get it.
Why did you even bother coming out here to do this troublesome work?
So this approach does not work on Takasu-kun.
I have known about the act for a while now, you know.
I cannot get by without this faCade.
You really do not understand my feelings, do you?
I mean, I am an airhead after all!
Hey, what is up all of a sudden?
If we are going to take shelter, we sho -
Why did not you say anything?!
I do not want to admit it...
That my life is being thrown into chaos by guys like him...
I moved away because of him.
I did not want to cause trouble for my parents.
So I moved here on my own to live with my relatives.
I took a short break from my modelling job, yet...
Now I have been chased all the way to this town!
They told us they went this way...
I do not care any more.
Let us just go home, Minorin.
I do not recall having to be called monster by suspicious people like you.
And besides, with whose permission are you taking pictures in the first place?
It is not like it is the end of the world.
I will destroy that camera and its owner!
Why are you running away, huh?!
I told you to stop running!
I mean, that guy's a pervert!
Why did I take a break from work, move out,
even change schools, all because of that bastard?
Getting all nervous, piling up stress, eating tons of candy...
It is like you were saying earlier...
That I should stop putting on this faCade.
You told me I should do that, did not you?
I am quitting the Ami-chan act.
I will quit it, I will quit it!
And then I will live on with this mean look!
I will not keep on getting beaten, either!
She ran through the town with a form that would have put even the track club to shame.
And then she recklessly smashed the frightened stalker's camera to pieces.
The stalker was terrified by the extreme change.
You are not the Ami-chan that I know!
Here, this will warm you up.
I am amazed you knew that.
You call her by her first name, right?
You are still suspicious of that?
and yet not even attempting to hide it...
And even so, she has friends.
Takasu-kun, what would you do if I showed you the real me?
Would you fall in love with me?
